supplement.heading: Supplement No. 1 to Part 774—The Commerce Control List

breadcrumbs: B. “Test”, “Inspection” and “Production Equipment”

3B001 Equipment for the manufacturing of semiconductor devices, materials, or related equipment, as follows (see List of Items Controlled) and “specially designed” “components” and “accessories” therefor.
Equipment designed for epitaxial growth as follows:
history.text:
Equipment designed for epitaxial growth of silicon (Si) or silicon germanium (SiGe), and having all of the following:
At least one preclean chamber designed to provide a surface preparation means to clean the surface of the wafer; and
a.4.a. At least one preclean chamber designed to provide a surface preparation means to clean the surface of the wafer; and
An epitaxial deposition chamber designed to operate at a temperature equal to or below 958 K (685 °C).
a.4.b. An epitaxial deposition chamber designed to operate at a temperature equal to or below 958 K (685 °C).

structure.heading: Equipment designed for epitaxial growth of silicon (Si) or silicon germanium (SiGe), and having all of the following:
structure.label: 3B001.a.4 – Equipment designed for epitaxial growth of silicon (Si) or silicon germanium (SiGe), and having all of the following:
